issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: We're not waiting for all inputs in MapRecordProcessor on Tez

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Flakiness with regard to SMB joins in tez. TEZ-1647 is required to complete the fix.
fields.summary: SMB joins fail intermittently on tez

ATTACHMENT ID: 12676724 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
Committed to branch and trunk. Thanks [~vikram.dixit]!

Doc note:  This adds configuration parameter *hive.tez.smb.number.waves* to HiveConf.java, so it needs to be documented in the wiki.

* [Configuration Properties -- Tez | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-Tez]
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.

Documented *hive.tez.smb.number.waves* in the wiki, so removed the TODOC14 label.

* [Configuration Properties -- hive.tez.smb.number.waves | https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Configuration+Properties#ConfigurationProperties-hive.tez.smb.number.waves]
